P

paint(Graphics) - Method in class jgame.Entity
Draws the Entity to the given Graphics object.
panTo(double, double, double) - Method in class jgame.World.Camera
Pans the camera to the specified position at the specified rate
pause(boolean) - Method in class jgame.World
Pauses the World, so it no longer updates it's Entities, and if hide is true, hides the Entities until World.play() is called
play() - Method in class jgame.World
Resumes Entity updates and drawing
printKeyBinds() - Static method in class jgame.Controller
Displays all current key bindings
printKeyBinds(boolean) - Static method in class jgame.Controller
Displays all current key bindings, sorted by bindings if specified, else sorted by keys
